content: Is there a minimalistic formatter for AST that, for example, converts structs of arrays into smth readable (like Defs, where tags is the source of truth, so the formatter skips redundant value_defs)?
We have a number of environment variables that dump it at certain passes I. A quite readable format
Listed at the bottom of this file: https://github.com/roc-lang/roc/blob/main/.cargo/config.toml
